title: SC EP:712 The Michigan Encounter Reloaded
itunes:title: SC EP:712 The Michigan Encounter Reloaded
description: On Friday night we heard from Rick who had a recent encounter in Michigan. Rick spoke about his fathers encounters. I spoke to Scott who is the father and he shared what happen to him growing up on a farm in a rural area. He saw the creature a few times and many strange things happened on the property.
content:encoded: On Friday night we heard from Rick who had a recent encounter in Michigan. Rick spoke about his fathers encounters. I spoke to Scott who is the father and he shared what happen to him growing up on a farm in a rural area. He saw the creature a few times and many strange things happened on the property.
itunes:subtitle: Bigfoot Encounter
